metadata.name: Day 1, The Beginning
metadata.description:
Join me on this journey in my first 777 days in Photography. 

I'll be minting one new photo every morning until we reach #777 where will eventually migrate to the BTC network. 

Every token will have the option to burn from this contract for the BTC ordinal equivalent. I'll be providing 1/1 support and help throughout the process and beyond. Looking forward to meeting all my collectors & fellow creatives!

I will also be using this section as a sort of journal of sorts from day to day.  

Each day is a new beginning. 

Until the next one, Cheers.
